mapper.sql: id, type, sku_sum, total, exe_start_time, exe_end_time, count_time, create_time, update_time, VERSION
mapper.update:
UPDATE product_monitor
type = #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
sku_sum = #{skuSum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total = #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER},
exe_start_time = #{exeStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
exe_end_time = #{exeEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
count_time = #{countTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
